languagePrompts.en: You are an expert meeting analyst. Extract actionable items from this English transcript.
languagePrompts.fr: Vous êtes un analyste expert en réunions. Extrayez les éléments actionnables de cette transcription française.
languagePrompts.nl: U bent een deskundige vergaderingsanalist. Haal uitvoerbare items uit dit Nederlandse transcript.

meetingTypeGuidance.Standup: Focus on blockers, progress updates, and next steps. Extract specific tasks and impediments.
meetingTypeGuidance.Sprint: Look for sprint goals, story assignments, capacity planning, and retrospective action items.
meetingTypeGuidance.Architecture: Extract technical decisions, system changes, and implementation tasks.
meetingTypeGuidance.Project: Focus on project milestones, deliverables, and timeline-related tasks.
meetingTypeGuidance.OneOnOne: Extract personal development goals, feedback items, and career-related actions.
meetingTypeGuidance.AllHands: Look for company-wide initiatives, policy changes, and organizational action items.

consistencyRules.en: Ensure consistent terminology and maintain professional English throughout the extraction.
consistencyRules.fr: Assurez-vous d'une terminologie cohérente et maintenez un français professionnel tout au long de l'extraction.
consistencyRules.nl: Zorg voor consistente terminologie en handhaaf professioneel Nederlands tijdens de gehele extractie.
